testcase.title: rhsm.cli.tests.FactsTests.VerifyFactKeyNamesListedIsLangIndependent_Test
testcase.description: verify that the facts --list of name keys is independent of LANG/LC_ALL... For example when LC_ALL=fr_FR.UTF-8 subscription-manager facts --list, EXPECTED: lscpu.virtualization_type: full ACTUAL(failed): lscpu.type_de_virtualisation: complet
